mapper.insert: insert into member values (#{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{pw}, #{tel}, null, 'ROLE_USER', sysdate())
mapper.select: select email, name, nickname, pw, tel, image, auth, join_dt from member where email in ( select pemail from partner where email = #{email} )
SELECT m.email, m.name, c.cno, c.clno, c.crank, c.cstatus FROM member AS m INNER JOIN clubmember AS c ON m.email = c.email WHERE c.clno = #{clno}
SELECT auth FROM member WHERE email =#{email}
